participant_1.background:
I love social medial especially twitter.
I have solar panels on my roof.
I spend a lot of time browsing the internet.
I buy only organic food products.
I am a feminist.

participant_2.background:
My wife spends all my money.
I am 40 years old.
I hate my job.
I work as a car salesman.

content.text: Hey, I'm a feminist and I love social medial, especially twitter. Do you have any social medial accounts?
I don't have any social media accounts. My wife spends all my money on clothes and shoes.
Oh, I'm sorry to hear that. I'm a feminist too and I love using social media to connect with people and share my thoughts.
I'm 40 years old and I hate my job. I work as a car salesman.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm a feminist and I love my job. I work as a social media manager for a large company.
I wish I had a job I loved. I'm not sure what I want to do with my life.
I'm sure you'll figure it out. You just have to keep trying new things until you find something you love.
Thanks for the advice. I appreciate it.
You're welcome. I'm always happy to help.
